meanings.definition: A Spanish drink made of red wine mixed with lemonade, fruit, and spices.
meanings.sent1: At the party, everyone enjoyed the refreshing sangrias.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served delicious sangrias with slices of oranges and apples.
meanings.sent3: The sangrias at the picnic were so popular, they disappeared in no time.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled like a pitcher of sangrias on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sangrias filled the room, tempting everyone to have a sip.
